text:
ITEM_ll+ (b)
Rad. Com.
Istanbul
SPORT :
SUMMER OLYMPICS, MUNICH 1972
As these notes are drafted the Administrative Office is
advised by the DOZ (Deutsches Olympia Zentrum) that it is about to
send directly to all EBU active members a detailed questionnaire on
their requirements. The launching of this questionnaire has been
delayed owing to modifications to the Olympics programme which have
continually intervened, but it is believed that the questionnaire
will be in the hands of member organizations before the end of
March.
